title: Champion mastery
body:
Has by any chance the champion mastery changed to get levels easier because it took me about 1-2 weeks to get rengar level 5 and played him almost non-stop and its taken me about 2-3 days playing blitzcrank with about 10-12 games with him and I've already got level 4??? 
{{champion:53}} {{champion:107}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Crackdogrock,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5tbYG5Ph,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-12T07:05:54.695+0000)
>
> I got ryze level 5 in like 2-3 days because I basically won every game :)

Ryze -.- death of me ….
Think ip grinding, you win and the ip still varies based on several factors. same for champ mastery

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5tbYG5Ph,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-12T07:00:18.486+0000)
>
> Think ip grinding, you win and the ip still varies based on several factors. same for champ mastery

that makes sense but i think its cause i was levelling up rengar mainly in normals and I've been levelling up blitzcrank in ranks :/ think thats why
The Points you get is based on your rank. Maybe you are a better than average Blitz player but a really sht Rengar player? LOL

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5tbYG5Ph,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-12T07:49:32.978+0000)
>
> The Points you get is based on your rank. Maybe you are a better than average Blitz player but a really sht Rengar player? LOL

well i did main thresh for like 2 months so i still had that mad life in me xD…..
But I'm not a good rengar say like ryan choi but I'm better then most rengar players.
